content.raw:
This is my post from a couple of weeks ago.  Sorry I forgot to log in.

Anyway, I found that the problem was caused by the fact that I had installed an old version of OGRE from source a couple of years ago and never removed it.  I removed it today and re-installed Gazebo, and everything appears to be working fine.
content.html:
This is my post from a couple of weeks ago. Sorry I forgot to log in.

Anyway, I found that the problem was caused by the fact that I had installed an old version of OGRE from source a couple of years ago and never removed it. I removed it today and re-installed Gazebo, and everything appears to be working fine.
